note:
Entroncamento, Portugal.

Started in newspaper advertisement design, back in the 1990s, and worked as book and magazine publisher, content editor, web editor and project manager. Graduated as a Clinical Psychologist.

Entrepreneurship and open source are my two main areas of interest. I praise the merits of community collaboration as the most advanced and sustainable form of intellectual and creative development.
